name: GameDev Simulator (Demo)
description:
INSTALL THE .ZIP FILE AND EXTRACT IT FOR THE BEST PERFORMANCE AND BEST GRAPHICS QUALITY.

GRAPHICS ON THE WEB VERSION IS DEGREADED FOR BETTER PERFORMANCE

HOW TO EXTRACT THE .ZIP FILE 101:

1. Install the .zip file

2. Go to the location of the file.

3. Right Click the file and press "Extract All"

4. Then press "Extract"

5. Open the new Extracted File, and double click the .exe file

IF IT SAYS IT'S A VIRUS. IT A LIE. I DON'T HAVE A LICENSE THAT'S WHY IT'S SHOWING THAT.

GameDev Simulator is a basic Simulator game made in the Godot Engine.
